title: Digital Invasion: Is Tech Robbing Us of Real Life Experiences?
description:
Today we discuss the idea that technology is changing the way we live, from taking a selfie rather than enjoying a sunset to being lost online rather than living in the moment, are we letting technology take over our real life experiences? Lets get into it!

Check out our new tech moves with: https://internetfactory.substack.com/

Join the conversation and share your thoughts in the comments below.
_____________ 

Don't forget to like, comment & subscribe for so you don't miss out!

#experience #technology #life
